items.name: Jayadev
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces
items.other_collaborators: Jon Chaika
items.short_bio: Dynamics on moduli spaces of quadratic differentials, comparisons to dynamics on moduli spaces of lattices.

items.name: Mikhail
items.title: GEAR Member
items.organization: Instituto Nacional de Mathematica Pura e Aplicada

items.name: Hans
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Gauge theory and low dimensional topology
items.other_collaborators: Cynthia Curtis, Stefan Friedl, Eric Harper, Christopher Herald, Benjamin Himpel, Paul Kirk, Andrew Nicas,
items.short_bio: Gauge theory and low dimensional topology, moduli spaces of flat connections and character varieties. Applications to invariants of knots and 3-manifolds.

items.name: Francis
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds, Geometric Group Theory
items.other_collaborators: Qingtao Chen, Helen Wong
items.short_bio: With respect to GEAR, the main thrust of my research is 2-fold. The first one is higher Teichmüller theory and representations of surface groups in SL_n(R) or SL_n(C). I am also interested in developing connections between 3-dimensional hyperbolic geometry, representations of surface groups in SL_2(C), and knot invariants based on the quantum group U_q(sl_2).

items.name: Steven
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Low dimensional topology and geometry. Character varieties.
items.other_collaborators: Adam Clay, Dale Rolfsen, Cameron Gordon, Liam Watson, Shicheng Wang, Radu Cebanu, Genevieve Walsh, Stephan Tillmann
items.short_bio: Low dimensional topology and geometry. Character varieties and their applications to low-dimensional manifolds.

items.name: Steven
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Higgs Bundles
items.other_collaborators: Indranil Biswas, Jim Glazebrook, Tomas Gomez, Adam Jacob, Franz Kamber, Vincent Mercat, Vicente Munoz, Peter Newstead, Mathias Stemmler
items.short_bio: I'm interested in moduli spaces associated with holomorphic vector bundles. In particular, I'm a big fan of applications of Higgs bundle technology to the study of surface group representation varieties. Before I die, I'd like to be able to compute the surface group representation corresponding to any given Higgs bundle, and vice versa.

items.name: Martin
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces
items.other_collaborators: Edward Taylor, Petra Bonfert-Taylor
items.short_bio: My current research interests are convex hulls of Kleinian groups, geometric identities on Moduli spaces and generalizations of Weil-Petersson geometry to higher Teichmüller spaces.

items.name: Alex
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric and Analytical Group Theory
items.other_collaborators: Artur Avila, Jon Chaika, Maxim Kontsevich, Carlos Matheus Santos, Martin Möller, Marcelo Viana, Anton Zorich

items.name: Elisha
items.title: GEAR Member
items.organization: Université Pierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI

items.name: Roberto
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds, Bounded cohomology and simplicial volume.
items.other_collaborators: Riccardo Benedetti, Bruno Martelli, Cristina Pagliantini, Carlo Petronio, Alessandro Sisto
items.short_bio: I am currently working on bounded cohomology of discrete groups, with a particular attention to results and techniques related to geometric group theory. I also used to study classical hyperbolic geometry, mainly in dimension 3, and I am still interested in the geometry and topology of low-dimensional manifolds.

items.name: Louis
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory
items.short_bio: Mapping class groups

items.name: Peter
items.title: GEAR Member
items.other_collaborators: I. Biswas, S.B.S.D. Castro, S. Dakhlia, A.D. King, M. Logares, V. Muñoz
items.short_bio: Geometry and topology of moduli spaces. Higgs bundles and their application to the study of character varieties of surface groups, especially for real Lie groups.

items.name: Olivier
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces
items.other_collaborators: François Guéritaud
items.short_bio: Main interests are convex-cocompact subgroups and generalizations, the relations between geometric and dynamical properties for discrete subgroups of Lie groups with an emphasis on "Higher Teichmüller spaces".

items.name: Thomas
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.other_collaborators: Dawid Kielak, Petra Schwer
items.short_bio: I am mainly interested in the asymptotic geometry of symmetric spaces, in degeneration of geometric structures and in the geometry of braid groups.

items.name: Zheng
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces
items.other_collaborators: Song Dai, Ren Guo, Marcello Lucia, Biao Wang
items.short_bio: Minimal surface problems in hyperbolic manifolds and geometry of Teichmüller spaces.

items.name: Christopher
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces
items.other_collaborators: Matthieu Gendulphe, Luc Hillairet
items.short_bio: I am interested in the Teichmüller flow on moduli space, especially closed orbits (Teichmüller curves). I am also interested in Laplace spectrum of hyperbolic manifolds.

items.name: Ilya
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory
items.other_collaborators: Tatiana Nagnibeda, Richard Weidmann, Paul Schupp, Armando Martino, Stefano Francaviglia, Mathieu Cerette, Ken'ici Ohshika, Woojin Jeon, Vadim Kaimanovich, Alexei Myasnikov, Vladimir Shpilrain
items.short_bio: I am interested in the dynamics and geometry of the mapping class groups and of the outer automorphism group of a free group, in group actions on R-trees, in hyperbolic geometry and low-dimensional topology, and in the geometry of the Teichmuller space and its "relatives" and analogs.

items.name: Michael
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.other_collaborators: Arkady Berenstein, Mladen Bestvina, Koji Fujiwara, Tom Haines, Bruce Kleiner, Janos Kollar, Shrawan Kumar, Al Marden, John Millson, Leonid Potyagailo, Ernest Vinberg
items.short_bio: Geometric topology, geometric geometry and geometric group theory.

items.name: Richard
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.other_collaborators: Eriko Hironaka, David Peifer, Saul Schleimer
items.short_bio: I am interested in the interplay of algebra, geometry, and analysis in the study of moduli of hyperbolic manifolds.

items.name: Sean
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Higgs Bundles, Character Varieties
items.other_collaborators: Indranil Biswas, Marina Logares, Lars Louder, Ben McReynolds, Dan Ramras
items.short_bio: The geometric, topological, algebraic, arithmetic, and dynamical structure of moduli spaces of Lie group valued representations of finitely generated groups and quivers; with applications to mathematical physics and geometric structure theory.

items.name: Feng
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces
items.short_bio: I am interested in finding geometric structures on low-dimensional spaces.

items.name: Howard
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces
items.other_collaborators: Keith Burns, Jon Chaika
items.short_bio: I study geometry of Teichmuller space and the mapping class group. I also study the dynamics of the SL(2,R) action moduli space of translation surfaces.

items.name: Karin
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces
items.other_collaborators: Uri Bader, Thierry Barbot, Andreas Cap, Mohammed Deffaf, Charles Frances, Katharina Neusser, Wouter van Limbeek
items.short_bio: Differential-geometric aspects of rigidity, Lorentzian Geometry, Conformal Geometry, other parabolic geometries

items.name: Yair
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.other_collaborators: Jason Behrstock, Tsachik Gelander, Grigori Margulis, Yoav Moriah
items.short_bio: I am interested in questions around hyperbolic manifolds, surfaces and mapping class groups, and connections to geometric group theory. For hyperbolic 3-manifolds I am interested in finding better explicit recipes for relating geometric to topological structures. Mapping class groups and other automorphism groups act on character varieties and I am interested in analysing this dynamical structure. Quasi-isometric rigidity is another topic I have worked on.

items.name: Mahan
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory
items.other_collaborators: Gautam Bharali, Indranil Biswas, Cyril Lecuire, Pranab Sardar, Saul Schleimer, Harish Seshadri
items.short_bio: My main interests lie at the interface of Geometric Group Theory and Kleinian groups. Another interest lies in Kähler groups, fundamental groups of (quasi) projective varieties.

items.name: Walter
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds

items.name: André Gama
items.title: GEAR Member
items.organization: Universidade de Trás-os-Montes e Alto Douro

items.name: Frederic
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.other_collaborators: Laurent Beaudou, Gregoire Dupont, Antoine Gerbaud, Laurent Grappe
items.short_bio: I'm interested in spaces of representations of surface groups and the natural action of the mapping class group on these spaces. Also interested in the relation between Teichmuller space and cluster algebras.

items.name: Athanase
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.other_collaborators: Norbert A'Campo, Charalampos Charitos, Mustafa Korkmaz, Lixin Liu, Yannis Papadoperakis, Roshdi Rashed, Weixu Su, Guillaume Théret, Marc Troyanov, Sumio Yamada
items.short_bio: Mapping class group actions, hyperbolic geometry, Finsler geometry.

items.name: John
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Hyperbolic Manifolds, Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces
items.other_collaborators: Krishnendu Gongopadhyay, Jose Seade, Shigeyasu Kamiya
items.short_bio: My main research is on discrete groups of complex hyperbolic isometries, and their deformation spaces. More widely, I am interested in hyperbolic geometry and discrete groups.

items.name: Frederic
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds, Equidistribution problems in locally symmetric spaces.
items.other_collaborators: Alexander Gorodnik, Jouni Parkkonen, Mark Pollicott, Barbara Schapira
items.short_bio: Ergodic theory of geodesic flows in negative curvature (counting and equidistribution, Gibbs measures, ...) and arithmetic applications. Geometric group theory (group actions on trees and buildings, ...). Discrete subgroups of Lie groups. Homogeneous dynamics and arithmetic applications.

items.name: Julien
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.short_bio: My research interests lie in low-dimensional geometry and topology. More precisely, I study hyperbolic geometry (mostly complex), reflection groups, and lattices in rank 1 semisimple Lie groups.

items.name: Joan
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.other_collaborators: Bessières, Laurent; Besson, Gérard; Dicks, Warren; Francaviglia, Stefano; Heusener, Michael; Leeb, Bernhard; Maillot, Sylvain; Menal Ferrer, Pere; Paoluzzi, Luisa
items.short_bio: Varieties of representations of three manifold groups. Geometric structures on three manifolds. Reidemeister torsions. Discrete subgroups of isometries of symmetric spaces.

items.name: Kasra
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds

items.name: Andrés
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.short_bio: My main interest is to understand representations of hyperbolic groups on semi-simple Lie groups. The main objective is understand how the intrinsic geometry of the hyperbolic group interacts with that of the Lie group.

items.name: Florent
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Higgs Bundles, Real algebraic geometry
items.other_collaborators: Chiu-Chu Melissa Liu
items.short_bio:
I work in the area at the intersection between the theory of Vector bundles on curves and Real algebraic geometry. Themes which are of special interest to me are:
-Topology of sets of real points of moduli schemes of vector bundles on a real algebraic curve (connected components, Betti numbers).
-Narasimhan-Seshadri, Hitchin-Kobayashi-Simpson and Donaldson-Corlette correspondences over real algebraic curves.

Research interests (AMS subject classification) :
-Vector bundles on curves and their moduli (14H60)
-Special connections and metrics on vector bundles (Hermite-Einstein-Yang-Mills) (53C07).
-Topology of real algebraic varieties (14P25).

items.name: Jean-Marc
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.other_collaborators: Thierry Barbot(Avignon), Francesco Bonsante(Pavia), Jeff Danciger, Colin Guillarmou(ENS), Kirill Krasnov(Nottingham), Gabriele Mondello(Roma), Sergiu Moroianu(IMAR Bucarest), Carlos Scarinci(Erlangen)
items.short_bio: 3d hyperbolic geometry, anti-de Sitter and other Lorentz geometry, Teichmüller theory, polyhedral and discrete geometry, etc.

items.name: Ser Peow
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.other_collaborators: Yoshinobu Kamishima, Inkang Kim, Joonhyung Kim, Sadayoshi Kojima, Shigeru Mizushima, Yasushi Yamashita, Yan Loi Wong, Ying Zhang
items.short_bio: I am interested in identities on hyperbolic surfaces and manifolds and their applications to the study of Teichmüller space and moduli spaces, and on dynamics of various group actions on moduli spaces.

items.name: Dylan
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Hyperbolic Manifolds, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Dynamics on Moduli Spaces
items.other_collaborators: Robert Lipshitz, Peter Ozsváth, Kevin Pilgrim
items.short_bio: I study a variety of geometric structures, especially 2- and 3-dimensional hyperbolic geometry and Teichmüller spaces. My recent work has been on characterizing post-critically finite rational maps.

items.name: Domingo
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Topology and Geometry of Algebraic Varieties
items.other_collaborators: Jim Carlson, Phillip Griffiths, Colleen Robles
items.short_bio: I am interested in topology of algebraic varieties and of Kähler manifolds, particularly their fundamental groups. One way to study these groups is from their linear representations and from harmonic theory, a subject closely related to Higgs bundles. Many examples come from hyperbolic geometry (real, complex and quaternionic). Surface groups and Teichmüller theory.

items.name: Anastasiia
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.short_bio: Intrinsic geometry of hyperbolic 3-manifolds (knot and link complements in particular), and connections between geometric invariants and invariants coming from other areas of mathematics (such as combinatorial, quantum, arithmetic invariants, etc).

items.name: Anna
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces
items.other_collaborators: Jeffrey Dancinger
items.short_bio: I am interested in representation varieties, discrete subgroups of Lie groups, higher rank symmetric spaces and deformation spaces of geometric structures. I like the interplay of different methods involved in the study of these objects.

items.name: Michael
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces
items.other_collaborators: Francesco Bonsante, Jon Chaika, Matthias Weber
items.short_bio: Teichmüller theory, including deformations of hyperbolic, conformal and projective structures and function theory and geometry of Teichmüller space. The Hitchin parametrization of the Hitchin component. Harmonic maps between surfaces, especially what invariants of those maps reveal about deformations of surfaces. Minimal surfaces, especially as elements of moduli spaces of candidates.

items.name: Maxime
items.title: GEAR Member
items.organization: Université Pierre et Marie Curie - Paris VI

items.name: Scott
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.short_bio: Hyperbolic geometry and applications of deformations of Riemann surfaces. Most recently interested in convex projective structures.

items.name: Dylan
items.title: Graduate Student
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Mathematical Physics
items.short_bio: Broadly speaking, I am interested in problems at the intersection of mathematics and theoretical physics. I am currently studying the relationships between Teichmüller theory and the theory of cluster algebras. Over the past few years, these subjects have been related to a number of topics in mathematical physics, including two-dimensional conformal field theory, wall crossing phenomena, and scattering amplitudes.

items.name: Artur
items.title: Graduate Student
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Higgs Bundles
items.short_bio: The subject of my thesis is the study of the geometry and topology of character varieties for representations of surface groups in real Lie groups by methods of the theory of Higgs bundles. I am also interested in the study of geometric structures, especially using methods of Higgs bundles, as well as interactions with theoretical physics.

items.name: Edgar
items.title: Graduate Student
items.organization: University of Illinois at Chicago (Advisor: Marc Culler)
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.short_bio: Effective and randomized methods in the theory of hyperbolic 3 manifolds and geometric group theory.

items.name: Jacob
items.title: Graduate Student
items.research_interests: Higgs Bundles
items.short_bio: My main interest is the geometry of moduli spaces of Higgs bundles. I study Higgs bundles via Nahm and Fourier--Mukai transforms.

items.name: Jean-Phillipe
items.title: Graduate Student
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.short_bio: I am interested in geometric structures such as projective, hyperbolic, lorentzian and symplectic structures on surfaces and 3-manifolds.

items.name: Luis Ángel
items.title: Graduate Student
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Higgs Bundles
items.short_bio: I)Higgs bundles, pairs, Hitchin-Kobayashi correspondence. II)Real bundles, K-theory.

items.name: Samuel
items.title: Graduate Student
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds, Character Varieties
items.short_bio: Study of moduli space of character varieties.

items.name: Antoine
items.title: Graduate Student
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory
items.short_bio: My field of research is geometric group theory. In particular I am interested in quasi-conformal properties of boundaries of hyperbolic groups and in groups acting on buildings.

items.name: Brian
items.title: Graduate Student
items.organization: University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign (Advisor: Steven Bradlow)
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Higgs Bundles
items.short_bio: I am mainly interested in using Higgs bundles techniques to study the representation variety for real groups, particularly the higher Teichmuller spaces.

items.name: Nelson
items.title: Graduate Student
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces
items.other_collaborators: Charles Frohman
items.short_bio: My main interest is Quantum topology. In particular Skein algebras of manifolds of the form Fx[0,1] at roots of unity. I'm more interested in finite extensions of this algebras and the relations with the character variety.

items.name: Kajal
items.title: Graduate Student
items.organization: École Normale Supérieure de Lyon (Advisor: Romain Tessera, Université Paris-Sud 11)
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.short_bio: I am mainly interested in geometric group theory and measurable group theory. I recently wrote a paper with Romain Tessera, 'integrable measure equivalence and the central extension of surface groups', where we give an example of a pair of groups which are quasi-isometric and measure equivalent but not integrable measure equivalent. The topic of my PhD thesis is `the geometry of amenable groups'. I am also interested in TQFT.

items.name: Aaron
items.title: Graduate Student
items.organization: University of Texas at Austin (Advisor: Andrew Neitzke)
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Quantum Field Theories
items.short_bio: I'm interested in the geometric aspects of physics in general, and field theories in particular. My current project involves deformations of flat $SL_2 \mathbb{C}$ connections which are similar in spirit to Dreyer's cataclysms for Anosov representations, and may also be distantly related to other wall-crossing-type constructions. I'd like to learn more about these constructions, in the hopes of distilling some useful knowledge about their common features.

items.name: Laura
items.title: Graduate Student
items.organization: University of Texas at Austin (Advisor: Andrew Neitzke)
items.research_interests: Higgs Bundles
items.short_bio: I am working on constructing approximate (non-singular) solutions of Hitchin's equations near the boundary of the moduli space via gluing methods.

items.name: Ser-Wei
items.title: Postdoc
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces

items.name: Sourav
items.title: Graduate Student
items.organization: Université Paris-Sud - Paris XI (Advisor: Francois Labourie)
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Higgs Bundles, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.short_bio: I am currently working on the Moduli Space of Margulis Space Time.

items.name: Clément
items.title: Graduate Student
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces
items.short_bio: The variety of representations of finitely generated groups into (reductive/semi-simple/simple) Lie groups has been studied a lot, especially when the finitely generated group is a surface group. Nevertheless, when a Fuchsian group contains elliptic elements (e.g. triangular groups) this variety may not be so easy to describe because the stabilizers of this group acting on the hyperbolic 2-manifold are not all trivial. My aim is to describe the variety of representations of a triangular group despite these problems.

items.name: Andy
items.title: Graduate Student
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Harmonic maps
items.short_bio: I am interested in harmonic maps between higher genus to lower genus compact Riemann surfaces. This leads me to also consider minimal surfaces in H2 x R, limits of Hopf differentials on surfaces, and the interplay between geometric structures living on either surface.

items.name: Semin
items.title: Graduate Student
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Higgs Bundles
items.short_bio: I am interested in applying analytic techniques to geometric problem, such as using harmonic maps to a compactification of Teichmuller space.

items.name: Julien
items.title: Graduate Student
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces
items.short_bio: I am interested in Topological Quantum Field Theories with compact gauge groups. More precisely, I study the projective representations of mapping class group that they define.

items.name: Georgios
items.title: Graduate Student
items.organization: University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign (Advisor: Steven Bradlow)
items.research_interests: Higgs bundles, Representation Varieties

items.name: Arielle
items.title: Graduate Student
items.organization: University of California, Santa Barbara (Advisor: Daryl Cooper)
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.short_bio: I am interested in geometric transitions- paths of geometric structures that change type within a homogeneous space. Specifically, I am studying limits of the Cartan subgroup in SL(n,R). These techniques can also be used within the context of convex projective structures to study generalized cusps on manifolds.

items.name: Qiongling
items.title: Graduate Student
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Higgs Bundles
items.short_bio: Riemannian metric structure on the Hitchin component, asymptotic behaviors of rays in Hitchin components, and algebra structure of the space of cross ratios of weak rank.

items.name: Kathryn
items.title: Graduate Student
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.short_bio: I study diffeomorphism and homeomorphism groups of manifolds and moduli spaces of group actions. Recently, I've been thinking about Hom(G, Homeo+(S^1)) and Hom(G, Diff+(S^1)) -- spaces of actions of a group G on the circle.

items.name: Simone
items.title: Graduate Student
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds, TQFT's

items.name: Thang
items.title: Graduate Student
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Hyperbolic Manifolds

items.name: Bram
items.title: Graduate Student
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.short_bio: My research focuses on low dimensional topology and geometry. In particular, I work on the study of random surfaces and (combinatorial) moduli spaces. The main goal is to understand the distribution of surfaces in various moduli spaces with respect to their geometric properties.

items.name: Maria Beatrice
items.title: Graduate Student
items.organization: Eidgenössische Technische Hochschule Zürich (Advisor: Alessandra Iozzi)
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds

items.name: Huygens Christian
items.title: Graduate Student
items.organization: Université du Québec à Montréal (Advisor: Steven Boyer)
items.research_interests: Low dimensional topology, symplectic topology, Fukaya categories, 3-manifolds Character varieties

items.name: Yitzchak Elchanan
items.title: Graduate Student
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.short_bio: I am interested in understanding hyperbolic 3-manifolds and the geometry of moduli spaces.

items.name: Zhe
items.title: Graduate Student
items.organization: Université Paris-Sud - Paris XI (Advisor: Francois Labourie)
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Higgs Bundles
items.short_bio: Poisson algebra and quantization for Hitchin components and some configuration spaces, such as swapping algebra, cluster algebra, Goldman bi Lie algebra. Some enumeration problems related to moduli spaces. Discrete integrable systems and Poisson-Lie group structure.

items.name: Jérémy
items.title: Graduate Student
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds, Quantum Teichmüller theory
items.short_bio: I am interested in the interaction between Globally Hyperbolic Anti-de Sitter 3-manifolds and particular types of diffeomorphisms (principally minimal Lagrangian) between hyperbolic surfaces with cone singularities. Moreover, I am interested in the topological invariants arising in the study of quantum Teichmüller space.

items.name: Nicolaus
items.title: Graduate Student
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.short_bio: I am interested in representations of surface groups or hyperbolic groups into semisimple Lie groups, in particular Anosov representations. One main motivation is understanding the behavior of proper actions under deformation towards the boundary of the space of Anosov representations, where interesting transitions can occur.

items.name: Weston
items.title: Graduate Student
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds

items.name: Caglar
items.title: Graduate Student
items.organization: University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign (Advisors: Ilya Kapovich, Christopher Leininger)

items.name: Grace
items.title: Graduate Student
items.organization: University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign (Advisor: Jayadev Athreya)
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces
items.short_bio: I study translation surfaces. Specifically the distribution of the gaps between the slopes of saddle connections on n-gons and Ls.

items.name: Kaidi
items.title: Graduate Student
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds

items.name: Ronald
items.title: Graduate Student
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Higgs Bundles, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.short_bio: I am working with the Moduli Space of rank three Higgs Bundles and Hitchin Pairs. My main objective is generalize a result from Tamás Hausel to compute the homotopy groups of the Moduli Spaces of k-Higgs Bundles, a particular kind of Hitchin Paris.

items.name: Shinpei
items.title: Postdoc
items.organization: California Institute of Technology (Mentor: Vlad Markovic)
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.short_bio: I) Understand relations between complex projective structures on a surface and the corresponding PSL(2, C)-character variety. II)Teichmüller rays and grafting rays.

items.name: Sam
items.title: Postdoc
items.organization: University of California, Santa Barbara (Mentor: Daryl Cooper)
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.short_bio: I am interested in projective structures on low dimensional manifolds and their relationship to character varieties. In particular, I am interested in convex projective structures and foliated structures arising from Hitchin representations.

items.name: Michael
items.title: Postdoc
items.organization: Université du Québec à Montréal (Mentors: Steve Boyer, Olivier Collin, Octav Cornea, Francois Lalonde)
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.other_collaborators: Swiatoslaw Gal, Jarek Kedra, Michal Marcinkowski, Egor Shelukhin

items.name: Guillaume
items.title: Postdoc
items.organization: University of Notre Dame (Mentor: François Ledrappier)
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces
items.other_collaborators: Michael Gekhtman, François Ledrappier, Andrew Sanders
items.short_bio: I am mostly interested in analyzing how concepts and techniques from classic hyperbolic geometry extend to higher Teichmüller theory. This includes the investigation of geometric invariants and deformations for Hitchin and Anosov representations, parametrizations of Hitchin components, symplectic and Poisson geometry of character varieties, compactification methods for Hitchin components.

items.name: Mario
items.title: Postdoc
items.organization: Ecole Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne (Mentor: Tamas Hausel)
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Higgs Bundles
items.other_collaborators: Luis Alvarez-Consul, Bjorn Andreas, Carl Tipler, Sara A. Filippini, Jacopo Stoppa, Julius Ross
items.short_bio: I am interested in geometric structures, partial differential equations and moduli spaces which arise in the interface between differential geometry, algebraic geometry and mathematical physics. In particular, I study special metrics and connections in complex and Kahler geometry, stability conditions for bundles and varieties and generalized geometry. Current projects where I participate include: gravitating vortices, geometry of heterotic string compactifications, Higgs bundles, hyperKahler metrics, irregular connections, geometric structures on spaces of stability conditions.

items.name: Jonah
items.title: Postdoc
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.other_collaborators: Tarik Aougab
items.short_bio: I am interested in curves on surfaces, Teichmuller theory, and hyperbolic structures on manifolds. My recent work has been abut Thurston's skinning map, and certain notions of 'maximality' for arrangements of curves on surfaces.

items.name: Funda
items.title: Postdoc
items.organization: University of Illinois at Urbana-Champain (Mentors: Ilya Kapovitch, Christopher Leininger)
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory
items.other_collaborators: Matt Clay, Johanna Mangahas
items.short_bio: Mapping class group, Out(F_n) and low dimensional topology (3-manifolds topology specifically).

items.name: Subhojoy
items.title: Postdoc
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.short_bio: I am interested in understanding the dynamics, in particular the asymptotic behavior, of certain deformations in moduli spaces of geometric structures on surfaces. Examples include grafting deformations of complex projective structures, and Teichmüller geodesic rays in Teichmüller space. My approach involves studying certain structures (eg. meromorphic quadratic differentials with higher order poles) that arise as limits of such deformations.

items.name: Sebastian
items.title: Postdoc
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.other_collaborators: Jon Chaika, Ursula Hamenstaedt, Dawid Kielak,  Damian Osajda,  Piotr Przytycki, Richard Webb
items.short_bio: My main interest lies in the intersection between geometric group theory and low-dimensional topology. I am interested in mapping class groups (of surfaces or other things) and how they act on associated spaces (Teichmüller space, complex of curves, etc).

items.name: Gye-Seon
items.title: Postdoc
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.short_bio: I am interested in the study of deformation spaces of geometric structures on manifolds (and orbifolds) and associated representation varieties. Over the years I've tried to understand the deformation spaces of real projective structures on Coxeter orbifolds.

items.name: Sara
items.title: Postdoc
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.other_collaborators: Jeffrey Danciger, Yuichi Kabaya
items.short_bio: My research interests lie at the intersection of hyperbolic geometry and low-dimensional topology. In particular, as a graduate student, I studied Kleinian groups and their limits. Now, as a postdoc, I am interested in different generalisations of quasifuchsian groups to other kind of geometries such as anti-de Sitter geometry and complex hyperbolic geometry, or, more generally, to Anosov representations into complex Lie groups. Another central theme of my research is the geometric and dynamical decompositions of character varieties.

items.name: Priyam
items.title: Postdoc
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.other_collaborators: Mark Hagen, Khalid Bou-Rabee

items.name: Anna
items.title: Postdoc
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Higgs Bundles, Relations to Physics
items.short_bio: My work focuses on the Hitchin system for Higgs bundles associated to real forms. This relates to physics via mirror symmetry, for example, and to higher Teichmüller theory via the Hitchin section, even if a higher dimensional geometric picture remains unclear.

items.name: Clara
items.title: Postdoc
items.research_interests: Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds, Lorentzian manifolds
items.short_bio: I work on conformally flats Lorentzian manifolds on dimension greater than 3, which are special case of (G,X)-structures. I specially work on the globally hyperbolic ones, which is a very restrictive hypothesis on their 'causal structure'.

items.name: Andrew
items.title: Postdoc
items.organization: University of Illinois at Chicago (Mentor: David Dumas)
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Higgs Bundles, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.short_bio: My primary interest is studying the interactions between harmonics maps and, particularly minimal surfaces, in symmetric spaces and the theory of representations of surface groups. Important elements which arise come from dynamical systems, Higgs bundles and geometry of symmetric spaces.

items.name: Florian
items.title: Postdoc
items.research_interests: Iterated Integrals, Configuration Spaces, Deformation Theory
items.short_bio: I am interested in the theory of higher holonomies and its applications, e.g. to the study of the geometry / topology of configuration spaces. I am also interested in deformation problems in geometry and physics.

items.name: Dmitry
items.title: Postdoc
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.short_bio: My PhD thesis was about quasi-Fuchsian hyperbolic manifolds and the flexibility of polyhedra in hyperbolic space. Currently, I study geometric group theory and projective structures on manifolds.

items.name: Marco
items.title: Postdoc
items.research_interests: Higgs Bundles
items.short_bio: In my Ph.D. thesis I have studied the character variety and the moduli space of Higgs bundles on Kähler manifolds. Currently, I am focusing on the applications of this theory to the representation theory of complex hyperbolic lattices.

items.name: Yunhui
items.title: Postdoc
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces
items.other_collaborators: Grigori Avramidi, Tam Nguyen Phan, Meng Wu
items.short_bio: I am very interested in Teichmuller theory, especially in the Weil-Petersson geometry of the Teichmuller space. I am also interested in the geometry and topology of open nonpositively curved manifolds, especially its relation to Teichmuller theory.

items.name: Tian
items.title: Postdoc
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds

items.name: Joel
items.title: Postdoc
items.research_interests: Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.other_collaborators: Matt Clay, Max Forester
items.short_bio: My research is in the areas of geometric group theory and low-dimensional topology. Much of my work has involved stable commutator length and quasimorphisms.

items.name: Youngju
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Hyperbolic Manifolds

items.name: Jeremy
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Dynamics on Moduli Spaces, Geometric and Analytical Group Theory, Geometric Structures and Teichmüller Spaces, Hyperbolic Manifolds
items.other_collaborators: Tanya Firsova, Mikhail Lyubich, Vladimir Markovic, Nikita Selinger
items.short_bio: Dynamics of one complex variables. Teichmuller theory especially quadratic differentials and the Teichmuller metric and its relation to Fenchel-Nielsen coordinates. Hyberbolic manifolds.

items.name: Ian
items.title: GEAR Member
items.research_interests: Higgs Bundles, Hyperbolic Manifolds, Minimal Surfaces
items.short_bio: My main interest is in the role minimal surfaces play in characterising hyperbolic 3-manifolds and complex hyperbolic 4-manifolds, and how to detect minimal surfaces amongst the harmonic maps which solve the Higgs bundle equations.
